metadata.synopsis: The player encounters a group of Harper scouts shortly after entering the Shadow-cursed lands. After being challenged by the scouts, they're forced to join sides as they're attacked by shadow creatures.

5.speaker: Harper Lassandra
5.text: Keep in the light! You - who the hells are you?!
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player has leroy jenkins'd into the scene by jumping off a high precipice from above, landing amidst the Harpers, who jump back in surprise, and regroup away from the player, so that the player is in a more 'standard' dialogue position at the end of the node. Lassandra gathers her wits immediately after her intiial shock and addresses the Harpers, afraid they've leapt into the darkness. Points weapon at player .NodeContext: 'Keep in the light' is to her HArpers. Address is to player. She points her sword at the player, ready to strike in an instant if necessary.

10.speaker: Harper Lassandra
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sword still pointed at player.

21.speaker: Harper Lassandra
21.text: Stay together! Keep to the light!
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: From off-screen, as the player picks their way carefully through the dark, twisted terrain.

40.context: CinematicNodeContext: In the darkness nearby, burning torches grow near, silhouetting a small knot of armed figures moving in a tight huddle. The player moves closer. A dead branch snaps underfoot, startling one of the figures - Lassandra, a wide-eyed young woman wearing half-plate under a blue cloak. She brandishes a torch and sword.

78.speaker: Harper Lassandra
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas (Harper 3) is moving wide of the group, an arrow notched to his bow, eyes fixed on the player. He's straying further from the Harpers' torches, walking along a sharp incline where road falls away, toeing the line between shadow and light.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: My name is [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Who are you?

28.speaker: Harper Lassandra
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*NodeContext: Suspicious

48.speaker: Player
48.text: An escaped lunatic. Be careful, or the madman will take over...

36.speaker: Harper Lassandra
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*NodeContext: Player is being really weird and LAssandra is responding with profound suspicion.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Someone who will snap both you and your weapons in two unless you lower them.

8.speaker: Harper Lassandra
8.text: Not taking requests, love. Now put your hands up and walk over here - slowly.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I am but a simple monk - I am no threat.

63.speaker: Harper Lassandra
63.text: I saw a 'simple monk' break a fella's spine once - hands where I can see them.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I'm a sorcerer, so kindly lower your weapons or things might get ugly. Very ugly.

30.speaker: Harper Lassandra
30.text: So you can fry us alive? I don't think so. Come into the light - hands high.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: A ranger who knows the marks of a hunting party - what are you tracking?

12.speaker: Harper Lassandra
12.text: It'll be you unless you show yourself. Come out - slowly.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I find the best introductions are made while sitting around a fire, perhaps with drinks?

23.speaker: Harper Lassandra
23.text: You're a chatty shadow, I'll give you that. Come out into the light - hands high.
23.context: NodeContext: suspicious but the barest hint of amusement in the first line

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Peace - I am a druid. This land and its festering shadows - what do you know of it?

24.speaker: Player
24.text: An expert in magic. Perhaps I can aid you in traversing this darkness. What do you know of it?

71.speaker: Harper Lassandra
71.text: Enough not to trust a voice from the darkness. Come into the light - hands high.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: A paladin - one who will only take you down if you're foolish enough to strike first.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: One who has sworn an oath to do no harm. Lower your weapons, please.

27.speaker: Harper Lassandra
27.text: Whether we attack or not depends entirely on you, love. Come into the light - hands high.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Back away from them, palms up.

17.speaker: Harper Lassandra
17.text: Wrong direction. Come into the light, hands high.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*

73.speaker: Player
73.text: [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Warrior-at-arms. I mean you no harm.

1.speaker: Harper Lassandra
1.text: I'll be the judge of that. Stow your weapons, put your hands up, and walk into the light - slowly.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Lassandra keeps her weapon raised. The male harper (Harper 3) inches around, arrow notched, to get a better angle on the player.*NodeContext: Aggressive - warning the player

76.context: CinematicNodeContext: *Something seems to dance in the gloom behind Harper 3's head for the faintest moment. A sadowy shape.*

60.speaker: Harper Lassandra
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas notices something behind him and twists to face this new threat, but it's already close and reaching for him. He stumbles to the side, tripping over a root as he tries to dodge a reaching claw, and tumbles down the incline, disappearing into the darkness. [The reaching claw can be cut for cinematic simplicity, the core of it is: "Yonas sees thing, gets spooked, falls down the incline and out of sight.]

16.speaker: Harper Meygan
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas notices something behind him and twists to face this new threat, but it's already close and reaching for him. He stumbles to the side, tripping over a root as he tries to dodge a reaching claw, and tumbles down the incline, disappearing into the darkness. [The reaching claw can be cut for cinematic simplicity, the core of it is: "Yonas sees thing, gets spooked, falls down the incline and out of sight.]NodeContext: Meygan notices the tentacle. Sudden shriek of alarm.

81.speaker: Harper Meygan
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lassandra and Megyn run over to the incline, torches held out, peering into the dark.

55.speaker: Harper Lassandra
55.text: Yonas? Can you see our torches?
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Megyn starts forward, but Lassandra holds out a hand to stop her.

41.speaker: Harper Yonas
41.text: I can't see anything. Something's wrong.
41.context: NodeContext: Pained grunt in the middle, like he's being injured by the curse.

46.speaker: Harper Lassandra
46.text: Follow my voice. Come back to the light.

43.speaker: Harper Yonas
43.text: Who's there? Meg? Is that - argh!
43.context: NodeContext: Pained; he's being transformed inside the curse.

13.speaker: Harper Meygan
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: A shape moves in the shadows, slowly approachingNodeContext: quietly

34.speaker: Harper Yonas
34.text: There you are... Come... Join me...
34.context: NodeContext: Shadowcursed now. A horrible zombified version of himself

47.speaker: Harper Meygan
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Meygan is holding a torchNodeContext: Horror in her voice

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Try to save them, get ready to fight.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Move. I'll take care of this.

20.speaker: Harper Lassandra
20.text: Don't let it get hold of you. Harpers - now!
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas gives Tav a demonic scowl and advances on them instead.NodeContext: Urgent, creature is approaching player. Gestures to troops to attack creature.

59.speaker: Harper Lassandra
59.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Guards up, everyone. I'm not letting the shadows take anyone else today.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I'm afraid poor Yonas is bait - and this is a trap.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Stop your mewling - it's time to fight or die. Choose.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: This darkness is no natural plight - we must fight, or succumb to it too.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Get behind me - I'll protect you.

79.speaker: Harper Lassandra
79.text: Not our style. Harpers - to arms!
79.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle (combat) first line is said to player, second to the harpers

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Yonas is gone. All that remains is a monster - one I intend to kill.

9.speaker: Harper Lassandra
9.text: Harpers - you heard them. TO ARMS!
9.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle

7.speaker: Player
7.text: His soul... consumed by the darkness. Not a good sign.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: The darkness can force rapid transfiguration? What magic is this?

66.speaker: Harper Lassandra
66.text: Now is not the time. Harpers, to arms!
66.context: NodeContext: Shouted to her troops before battle (combat) first line is said to player, second to the harpers

25.speaker: Harper Lassandra
25.text: Step out of the light and you're done for, freak. Fight with us or die in the dark. To arms! Now!
25.context: NodeContext: Grim determination, then a shout to her troops

77.speaker: Harper Lassandra
77.text: Step out of the light and you're done for. It's fight or die. To arms! Now!
77.context: NodeContext: Grim determination, then a shout to her troops

61.speaker: Player
61.text: I am but a faithful adherent - I do not wish to fight you.

49.speaker: Harper Lassandra
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yonas (Harper 3) is moving wide of the group, an arrow notched to his bow, eyes fixed on the player. He's straying further from the Harpers' torches, walking along a sharp incline where road falls away, toeing the line between shadow and light.

68.speaker: Harper Lassandra
68.text: Keep in the light! You - who the hells are you?!
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player has leroy jenkins'd into the scene by jumping off a high precipice from above, landing amidst the Harpers, who jump back in surprise, and regroup away from the player, so that the player is in a more 'standard' dialogue position at the end of the node. Lassandra gathers her wits immediately after her intiial shock and addresses the Harpers, afraid they've leapt into the darkness. Points weapon at player .NodeContext: 'Keep in the light' is to her HArpers. Address is to player. She points her sword at the player, ready to strike in an instant if necessary.

67.speaker: Harper Lassandra
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sword still pointed at player.
